text: Osornophryne (Plump Toads) is a genus of true toads. They live in Colombia and Ecuador. ==Species== Binomial Name and Author Common Name Osornophryne antisana Napo Plump Toad Osornophryne bufoniformis Peracca's Plump Toad Osornophryne guacamayo Guacamayo Plump Toad Osornophryne percrassa Herveo Plump Toad Osornophryne puruanta Osornophryne sumacoensis Osornophryne talipes Cannatella's Plump Toad ==Other websites== * . 2007.
